name: System Profiler
description: System Profiler is a command-line utility on macOS that provides detailed information about the hardware and software configuration of the machine. It can display configurations such as network settings, installed software, device specifications, and system performance metrics. This utility is commonly used for system diagnostics and troubleshooting. The data from System Profiler can also assist in system audits and inventory management. The information generated by this utility is exhaustive and structured, making it ideal for both manual review and automated processing.
